paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the BRCA2 variant W563* including clinical significance, patient demographics, penetrance data, and individual records.

patients.phenotype: squamous cell carcinoma of the oral cavity with lung nodule and hilar lymphadenopathy

individual_records.phenotype_details: squamous cell carcinoma of the tongue, with lung nodule and hilar lymphadenopathy
individual_records.evidence_sentence: His family history of cancer included his mother with multiple myeloma and his father with lung cancer and melanoma.

functional_data.summary: Germline BRCA2 mutation confirmed through blood test.

variants.segregation_data: Confirmed germline mutation in the patient.
variants.additional_notes: The patient was treated with chemotherapy and briefly on PARP inhibitor without response.
key_quotes: Both specimens had the same TP53 (R273H) and BRCA2 (W563*) mutations.
His family history of cancer included his mother with multiple myeloma and his father with lung cancer and melanoma.

extraction_metadata.notes: Extraction was straightforward as the paper provided clear information on the BRCA2 variant.
